H3.text: In which modern-day country is the birthplace of Buddha (Siddhartha Gautama). FDRN

A4.text: LumbinÄ« is a Buddhist pilgrimage site in the Rupandehi District of Lumbini Province in Nepal.

A5.text: The Ashoka Pillar of Lumbini, discovered at Rupandehi in 1896, is believed to mark the spot of Ashoka's visit to Lumbini.
